find_similar_links.description: Find pages similar to a given URL.

props.name: url
props.description: Reference URL to find semantically similar links.

props.name: numResults
props.description: Number of results to return (max 100).

props.name: includeDomains
props.description: List of domains to include in results.

props.name: excludeDomains
props.description: List of domains to exclude from results.

props.name: startCrawlDate
props.description: Include links crawled after this date (ISO format).

props.name: endCrawlDate
props.description: Include links crawled before this date (ISO format).

props.name: startPublishedDate
props.description: Only include links published after this date (ISO format).

props.name: endPublishedDate
props.description: Only include links published before this date (ISO format).

props.name: includeText
props.description: Strings that must be present in the webpage text (max 1 string of up to 5 words).

props.name: excludeText
props.description: Strings that must not be present in the webpage text (max 1 string of up to 5 words).

generate_answer.description: Provides direct answers to queries by summarizing results.

props.name: query
props.description: Ask a question to get summarized answers from the web.

props.name: text
props.description: If true, includes full text content from the search results

props.name: model
props.description: Choose the Exa model to use for the answer.

get_contents.description: Retrieve clean HTML content from specified URLs.

props.name: urls
props.description: Array of URLs to crawl

props.name: text
props.description: If true, returns full page text. If false, disables text return.

props.name: livecrawl
props.description: Options for livecrawling pages.

props.name: livecrawlTimeout
props.description: Timeout for livecrawling in milliseconds.

props.name: subpages
props.description: Number of subpages to crawl.

props.name: subpageTarget
props.description: Keyword(s) to find specific subpages.

perform_search.description: Search query to find related articles and data.

props.name: query
props.description: Search query to find related articles and data.

props.name: type
props.description: Type of search to perform.

props.name: category
props.description: Category of data to focus the search on.

props.name: numResults
props.description: Number of results to return (max 100).

props.name: includeDomains
props.description: Limit results to only these domains.

props.name: excludeDomains
props.description: Exclude results from these domains.

props.name: startCrawlDate
props.description: Only include results crawled after this ISO date.

props.name: endCrawlDate
props.description: Only include results crawled before this ISO date.

props.name: startPublishedDate
props.description: Only include results published after this ISO date.

props.name: endPublishedDate
props.description: Only include results published before this ISO date.

props.name: includeText
props.description: Strings that must be present in the text of results.

props.name: excludeText
props.description: Strings that must not be present in the text of results.
